title: MDK [PC] [ENGLISH] [FULL] [Windows/Linux]
description:
INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS


Just Mount & Install MDK [North America Release].


 a) At Select Target Platform check and install all 3 options Win95 / DOS / Direct3D and see witch one works better for you.
 b) Chose the Large Install option.


Works on Windows XP (and maybe on Windows 7 under Windows XP Compatibility Mode)
Works on Windows 7 (if you install the DOS version and run the game in DOSBox)
Works on Linux (if you install the DOS version and use a Linux DOS emulator)


IMPORTANT NOTE


 In order to get the FULL ENDING you need to have MDK mounted on a virtual drive or burned on a CD (witch of course should be in you CD/DVD ROM).


Enjoy & Please Seed!
